column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As a franchise concept
column2: Los Angeles-based JINYA contractually obligates its franchisees to follow guidelines for food quantities
column4: the amount of toppings we put in each bowl has been predetermined
column6: most of our fresh produce must be "imported" from California to ensure quality control
column7: all of which comes at a higher cost than what we might be sourced locally. And while the market price of fresh bamboo (we don't use canned) may fluctuate
column8: our prices for toppings must remain fixed.
